forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 61. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. South southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
This evening, Downtown San Francisco greets us with a calm, slightly hazy charm, as the remnants of the day drift into night. The fading sunlight gives way to a soft, dusky palette, the skies transitioning from cerulean to muted gray, suggesting a serene but not entirely clear view of the skyline. While the sun has pushed temperatures to a comfortable bracket, the gentle winds whisper through the streets, adding a refreshing touch. The lack of heavy fog is notable; the marine layer stays somewhat at bay, allowing silhouettes of buildings to peek through as daylight wanes.

As night envelops the city, dressing in layers becomes a prudent choice, pairing a light jacket with a cozy sweater, suited for the cooling temperatures that will soon settle around fifty-two degrees. The allure of a leisurely stroll along Fort Mason or a quiet evening in one of the many intimate cafes beckons, perfect for unwinding after a bustling day. Whether you find peace in the pages of a novel or enjoy the light buzz of conversation among friends, tonight offers the kind of atmosphere that wraps around you like a familiar embrace, urging you to savor the unmistakable character of San Francisco.
